panels.description: tx beam is at nodeA and rx beam is at nodeZ
panels.title: Beam Indices - $nodeA_name <-> $nodeZ_name  (${__from:date} -- ${__to:date})

panels.description: tx beam is at nodeZ and rx beam is at nodeA
panels.title: Beam Indices - $nodeZ_name <-> $nodeA_name  (${__from:date} -- ${__to:date})

panels.description: mgmtlinkup - linkavailable --> if this changes, indicates LINK_UP_DATADOWN state

targets.expr:
fw_uptime{network="$network", linkName="$link_name", linkDirection="A", intervalSec="$intervalSec"} - 
link_avail{network="$network", linkName="$link_name", linkDirection="A", intervalSec="$intervalSec"}

panels.title: mgmtlinkup/linkavailable - $nodeA_name -> $nodeZ_name  (${__from:date} -- ${__to:date})

panels.description: mgmtlinkup - linkavailable --> if this changes, indicates LINK_UP_DATADOWN state
panels.title: mgmtlinkup/linkavailable - $nodeZ_name -> $nodeA_name  (${__from:date} -- ${__to:date})

panels.description:
if delta(txppdu) >> delta(rxppdu) indicates missing PPDUs

plots tx (rx) PPDU count (i) - tx(rx) PPDU count (i-60s)
panels.title: PPDU - $nodeA_name -> $nodeZ_name  (${__from:date} -- ${__to:date})

panels.description:
if delta(txppdu) >> delta(rxppdu) indicates missing PPDUs

plots tx (rx) PPDU count (i) - tx(rx) PPDU count (i-60s)
panels.title: PPDU - $nodeZ_name -> $nodeA_name  (${__from:date} -- ${__to:date})

panels.description:
if delta(txBA) >> delta(rxBA) indicates missing block acks

plots tx (rx) BA count (i) - tx(rx) BA count (i-60s)
panels.title: BA - $nodeA_name -> $nodeZ_name  (${__from:date} -- ${__to:date})
